verses.html:
1
Think and reflect;
God prepares a land so bless’d.
Leave your sins and come find strength in
hope for heaven’s rest.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Why be sinless? Why be pure thus?
Think and reflect;
Heav’n is holy, heav’n is lovely,
blessings o’erflow;
I will ever struggle to reach that Home.

2
Think and reflect;
Jesus shares a land that’s bless’d.
Hold your faith and seek His favor;
hope for heaven’s rest.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Why be selfless? Why seek Jesus?
Think and reflect;
Heav’n is endless, heav’n is spacious,
boundless and free;
I will ever strive for my Home to see.

3
Think and reflect;
On the Holy Spirit bless’d.
For His dear love follow Him, then;
hope for heaven’s rest.

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Why seek His Way? Why must we pray?
Think and reflect;
Heav’n is splendour, heav’n is treasure,
precious and rare;
I will ever run to my promise there.
